snippet: Organizing for Action, the advocacy group supporting President Barack Obama's agenda, is scaling back its fundraising efforts and cutting its paid staff in half as focus shifts to the approaching midterm elections, three Democratic officials said....

headline.print_headline: Obama Group OFA Scales Back Staffing, Fundraising
headline.main: Obama Group OFA Scales Back Staffing, Fundraising

lead_paragraph: Organizing for Action, the advocacy group supporting President Barack Obama's agenda, is scaling back its fundraising efforts and cutting its paid staff in half as focus shifts to the approaching midterm elections, three Democratic officials said.
